entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Charlevoix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlevoix 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -11.2°C
Wind: E 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
